data.description:
Dive into art that lives elsewhere, hand painted and animated by creators from all over the world. Enjoy expressive characters, delightful moments, and long form narratives in virtual reality. Theater Elsewhere brings the magic to you.  

Featuring:
- 2400+ delightful immersive animated content
- 6 beautiful immersive backgrounds that can be set as the default browsing environment
- Intuitive and fast user interface
- Freefly Mode that allows users to move freely within each experience

If you would like to share your own creations, test your hand in the VR painting and animation app, Quill by Smoothstep, available on the Meta Quest PCVR platform, upload your content through Meta Quest Media Studio and it will appear in the “Newest” section of Theater Elsewhere.  

Quill by Smoothstep

https://www.meta.com/experiences/pcvr/quill-by-smoothstep/5910229332328230/

Meta Quest Media Studio

https://creator.oculus.com/manage/mediastudio/

changelog.change_log:
- The “VR Animation Player” has been rebranded to “Theater Elsewhere”
- Added NUX (New User Experience)  
- Added 6 Immersive Discovery Environments to set as default browsing space
- New content discovery surface enabling easy browsing of all available content
- New navigation UI to make it easier to experience content.
- Added Freefly Mode enabling free movement within content
- Bookmark content while browsing or viewing content
- Added “Play Next” and “Play Previous” feature
- Added content view count and publish date

- Redirect to Meta Quest TV on back / home button press
- Prevent missing audio / rendering freeze system issue
- Introduces a brief loading indicator before redirecting to Meta Quest TV for browsing VR Animations to avoid some system bugs

- Fix for file cache not being cleared
- More bug fixes

- New localization text rendering
- Add loop key support
- Add spawn area default key support
- Fix audio within span playback issue

Updated audio engine to 1.10.4
Fixed rendering difference in pretesselated vs static
Fixed individual creators metadata
Fixed crash exiting without loading a document
Fixed crash quitting the app during the loading/decoding phase
